''About us Settings Our HTL was established in 2001. We provide clients with various services related to haircuts, such as haircuts and hair coloring. At the same time, we also sell hair care products and shampoos. Our barbers are all professionally trained. There are no hairstyles they can't cut, only hairstyles that customers can't think of. As long as they are professionally and flexibly trimmed, anyone can make a gorgeous transformation. Our dyes are both natural and harmless, so customers do not have to worry about sensitive scalp or harmful reactions to the scalp. At the same time, our dye is not easy to decolorize, once the customer's hair is dyed with our dye, it will remain forever. Our products are also quality-recognized, and there are absolutely no additives harmful to the human body. So customers can buy and use our products with confidence.

//services list Services List
Hair Cut Color Hair Perm Shampoo Service Nail Treatment Package 1
Hair Cut + Color Package 2

Hair Cut + Color + Hair Perm + Shampoo Service
Booking Now Enter yours comments 
 (At most 20 words) SEND COMMENT
Price: RM55 - RM90

For the Hair Cut we have 3 type category of Baber. The First category of Baber is Senior Stylist. Senior Stylist is priced at RM 55 for boys and RM 70 for girls. The Second category of Baber is Professional. Professional is priced at RM 60 for boys and RM 80 for girls. The Third category of Baber is Director. Director is priced at RM 70 for boys and RM 90 for girls. Price: RM150 – RM220

COLOR is a fixed price for men women need to see hair length. We have 3 different prices for girl of colours are short hair, medium hair and long hair. Short Hair is priced at RM 220, Medium Hair is priced at RM 250 and Long Hair is priced at RM 280.The price for a man is RM 150. Price: RM180 – RM400

Hair Perm.We have 2 type of Hair Perm, the first type is Cold Perm is for boys the price is RM 180. Another type is Digital Perm is for a girl the price is depends on the hair length, Short Hair is priced at RM 350, Medium Hair is priced at RM 380 and Long Hair is priced at RM 400. Price: RM30 – RM60

Providing shampoo service is not only to provide customers with a pleasant and relaxing experience, but also to clean the hair and scalp. The uniform rate for boys is RM30. For girls, RM40 for short hair and RM60 for long hair. Price: RM70

To strenghten your natural nails so that they can grow long and healthy, and to insure nail plate is tough to withstand any nail enhancements. Price of Hair Cut: RM50 – RM85
Price of Color: RM140 – RM260

Hair Cut + Color is a Package 1. The price of this package 1 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 50 for boys and RM 65 for girls. Professional is RM 55 for boys and RM 75 for girls. Director is RM 65 for boys and RM 85 for girls. Color for Boys is RM 140, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM200, Medium Hair is RM 230 and Long Hair is RM 260. Price of Hair Cut: RM50 – RM85
Price of Shampoo Service: RM25 – RM55

Hair Cut + Shampoo Service is a Package 2. The price of this package 2 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 50 for boys and RM 65 for girls. Professional is RM 55 for boys and RM 75 for girls. Director is RM 65 for boys and RM 85 for girls. Shampoo Service for Boys is RM25. For girls, RM35 for short hair and RM55 for long hair. Price of Hair Cut: RM50 – RM85
Price of Hair Perm: RM165 – RM380

Hair Cut + Hair Perm is a Package 3. The price of this package 3 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 50 for boys and RM 65 for girls. Professional is RM 55 for boys and RM 75 for girls. Director is RM 65 for boys and RM 85 for girls. Cold Perm for boys is RM 165, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 330, Medium Hair is RM360, Long Hair is RM 380. Price of Color: RM140 – RM260
Price of Hair Perm: RM165 – RM380

Color + Hair Perm is a Package 4. The price of this package 4 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. Color for Boys is RM 140, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM200, Medium Hair is RM 230 and Long Hair is RM 260. Cold Perm for boys is RM 165, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 330, Medium Hair is RM360, Long Hair is RM 380. Price of Hair Cut: RM50 – RM85
Price of Shampoo Service: RM25 – RM55
Price of Hair Perm: RM165 – RM380

Hair Cut + Shampoo Service + Hair Perm is a Package 5. The price of this package 5 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. 

Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 50 for boys and RM 65 for girls. Professional is RM 55 for boys and RM 75 for girls. Director is RM 65 for boys and RM 85 for girls. Shampoo Service for Boys is RM25. For girls, RM35 for short hair and RM55 for long hair. Cold Perm for boys is RM 165, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 330, Medium Hair is RM360, Long Hair is RM 380. Price of Hair Cut: RM45 – RM80
Price of Color: RM130 – RM250
Price of Hair Perm: RM150 – RM370

Hair Cut + Color + Hair Perm is a Package 6. The price of this package 6 will be cheaper than monomer. So Customer can enjoy three services at the discounted price. 

Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 45 for boys and RM 60 for girls. Professional is RM 50 for boys and RM 70 for girls. Director is RM60 for boys and RM 80 for girls. Color for Boys is RM 130, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM190, Medium Hair is RM 220 and Long Hair is RM 250. Cold Perm for boys is RM 150, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 320, Medium Hair is RM350, Long Hair is RM 370. Price of Color: RM140 – RM260
Price of Hair Perm: RM165 – RM380
Price of Nail Treatment: RM60

Color + Hair Perm + Nail Treatment is a Package 7. The price of this package 7 will be cheaper than the monomer. So Customer can enjoy two services at the discounted price. 

Color for Boys is RM 140, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM200, Medium Hair is RM 230 and Long Hair is RM 260. Cold Perm for boys is RM 165, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 330, Medium Hair is RM360, Long Hair is RM 380. Price of Hair Perm: RM165 – RM380
Price of Nail Treatment: RM60

Color for Boys is RM 140, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM200, Medium Hair is RM 230 and Long Hair is RM 260. Cold Perm for boys is RM 165, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 330, Medium Hair is RM360, Long Hair is RM 380.

Price of Color: RM130 – RM250
Price of Hair Perm: RM150 – RM370
Price of Shampoo Service: RM25 – RM55

Hair Cut for Senior Stylist is RM 45 for boys and RM 60 for girls. Professional is RM 50 for boys and RM 70 for girls. Director is RM60 for boys and RM 80 for girls. Color for Boys is RM 130, for girls is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM190, Medium Hair is RM 220 and Long Hair is RM 250. 

Cold Perm for boys is RM 150, for girls is Digital Perm and the price is depends on the hair length: Short Hair is RM 320, Medium Hair is RM350, Long Hair is RM 370. Shampoo Service for Boys is RM25. For girls, RM35 for short hair and RM55 for long hair.
